titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce emissions of carbon dioxide by imposing a tax on certain fuels based on their carbon content.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E253-254)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/3/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to impose a tax on the sale or importation of the following fuels based on their carbon content: coal, petroleum, and natural gas. Provides an inflation adjustment for such tax rates after calendar year 1994.
